name: Daedalus
description: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks have a chance to inflict critical damage.
notes: Critical strike procs have the following properties: The proc is determined during the unit's attack point.
The proc chance of multiple sources stack. However, when multiple critical strike sources proc simultaneously, the higher critical factor takes precedence.
Increases attack damage by an average of 37.5%.
Displays critical strike values before all damage manipulation sources for camouflaging purposes.
